title: Educational Project for Information System Development Using Hybrid Agile Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information system development processes and agile methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: Practice-Centered Project-Based Learning Environment for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers. Agile Development Practice Using VR Simulations in a BYOD Environment, with Enhanced Training for Responding to Requirement Shocks

learning_goals: Learners can plan and execute information system development projects by applying hybrid agile methodologies.
Learners can establish and implement strategies to flexibly respond to requirement shocks in VR-based simulation environments.
Learners can design a project management system that integrates the strengths of various agile methodologies, such as Scrum, Kanban, and XP.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
